sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2350 ( DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_END_DT , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_USE_YN , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #busnDtlTypOccuCd# , #busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCd# , #busnSmlrDtlTypOccuNm# , #busnSmlrTypOccuBgnnDt# , #busnSmlrTypOccuEndDt# , #busnSmlrTypOccuUseYn# , #busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCtnt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2350 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCd# , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM=#busnSmlrDtlTypOccuNm# , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT=#busnSmlrTypOccuBgnnDt# , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_END_DT=#busnSmlrTypOccuEndDt# , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_USE_YN=#busnSmlrTypOccuUseYn# , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CTNT=#busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCtnt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# AND BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# AND BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_END_DT , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_USE_YN , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# AND BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_END_DT , BUSN_SMLR_TYP_OCCU_USE_YN , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD DESC , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
